channel.title: Outer wear – HaakenWP
channel.description: Một trang web mới sử dụng WordPress

item.title: NYKE RENEW SERENITY RUN
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Take your mental health on the road with a neutral running shoe made for the moments when your steps speed up to let your mind slow down.Plush, lightweight cushioning and a fit that’s optimised for comfort help you stayed focused on the joy in every mile.
item.content:encoded:
FIND YOUR PEACE IN LIGHTWEIGHT, CUSHIONED COMFORT.

Take your mental health on the road with a neutral running shoe made for the moments when your steps speed up to let your mind slow down.Plush, lightweight cushioning and a fit that’s optimised for comfort help you stayed focused on
the joy in every mile.

Your Mantra

An inner tag reads “Leave the negative, keep the positive, multiply your potential” to give you inspiration at every step.

Obsessed With Comfort

Ultra-soft cushioning feels responsive to give you a great feel from heel to toe.Nike Renew foam and a plush insole combine for lasting comfort.That feeling extends to the plush, wide opening around your heel and ankle that feels so
good you simply forget about it.

Supportive Fit

A strap wraps under your arch to give you that supportive comfort you expect.It tightens up when you pull the laces so you control the fit.

More Benefits
  • A rubber sole provides durable traction.
  • Mesh throughout the upper feels cool and breathable.
  • Colour Shown: White/Magic Ember/Light Soft Pink/Black
  • Style: DB0522-101
  • Country/Region of Origin: Vietnam

Day hikes, thru hikes, travel or using them traditionally you will love these shoes. Spring summer, fall or winter we have shoes that will fit some and even all conditions! Running on trails these shoes offer lightweight and tackle rough trails, alpine, rocky dusty, muddy trails, snowy trails. Technical climbs and descents these shoes will be stable, rugged and durable. We have compiled this list from REAL testing in the pasific northwest and believe these are the best trail runners money can buy in 2021. These are so popular that ALL are available in both men and women’s models.

item.title: NYKE AIR ZOOM TERRA KIGER 7
item.dc:creator: tranthanhphuem
item.description: Run the trail in a super-responsive running shoe.Fast and lightweight, it delivers a breathable and secure feel as you race over rocky paths.Updated traction lugs provide stability for your downhill miles.
item.content:encoded:
TACKLE TOUGH TERRAIN IN LIGHT STABILITY.

Run the trail in a super-responsive running shoe.Fast and lightweight, it delivers a breathable and secure feel as you race over rocky paths.Updated traction lugs provide stability for your downhill miles.

Push Forwards

Nike React technology is a lightweight and durable foam that delivers a responsive ride.A Zoom Air unit in the forefoot provides extra responsiveness, returning your energy to help guide you down the trail.

Multi-Surface Traction

Multi-directional traction lugs in the heel are made from high-abrasion rubber.They help provide enhanced grip on descents and ascents.

Light and Breathable

A mesh and synthetic upper delivers a lightweight feel and enhanced ventilation.

Trail-Ready Support

A Dynamic Fit System through the midfoot helps hug and support your foot as you run through rocky trails.

More Benefits
  • Rock plate at the heel helps shield your foot on rough terrain.
  • Slim, cushioned collar provides soft comfort and a streamlined look.
  • Padded tongue helps relieve pressure caused by foot swelling over long-mileage runs.
Product Details
  • Weight: 309.4g (approx.) (Men’s size 9)
  • Offset: 4.5mm (Forefoot: 12mm, Heel: 16.5mm)
  • Colour Shown: Total Orange/Signal Blue/Wolf Grey/Obsidian
  • Style: CW6062-800
  • Country/Region of Origin: China
